segments.text: I keep looking from the interior chaos to the scene outside the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Through the panes, I can see a perfectly calm garden path.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There are neat bushes and a tidy fence in the distance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sunlight illuminates it all so peacefully and beautifully.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It presents such a stark contrast to what's happening inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Here, water is flooding the floor and children are risking a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Out there, everything seems utterly tranquil and orderly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes the domestic disorder feel even more pronounced.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The peacefulness of the garden is almost mocking the kitchen's impending doom.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish I could step into that serene world for a moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s like two different realities existing side by side.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window acts as a portal to a better, calmer place.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Such a shame the beauty outside isn't reflected within these walls.
segments.speaker: PAR
